prabhakaran wisin uthure muslim warun palawa harina wita owun pakisthanayata ho sawdi arabiyata nowa aarakshawa sadaha paminiye thawamath jiwath wana nagenahira pradesha walataya.me rate bhaumika akhandathawayata alum kala nisama thaman awurudu siya ganan jiwath wu bhumi walin palawa harinu labiya.prabhakarange eelam wadaya piligaththe nam, uthure muslim warunta yahathin wajabennata thibini.
pora katha ma kawadawath liya natha.
chanda himiyanta thaman ge kamaththa paridi apekshakayan wetha manapa prakasha kala hakiyi.

ane ikmanata nala methanin chutha wennayi mage hitha kiyayi.mata kala haki an yamak natha.gasa pamula siti ayata da kala haki yamak natha.ma boho welawak gasa udaya.pupuru gasana dekakul, wewla yana danahis walalle shakthiyen dadi asiruwen randawa gathimi.mastarlage snanaya nimawiya.gasa pamulinma owun dedena awida giyaha.kurumba kama paththaka thaba mama adiyata, dekata gasin basa gaththemi.me 1973 warshayayi.
adi pahalowak withara usa dawantha minihek mangala himiyan desa miniya asala sita bala siti.
